scripts.//examples-program: Run bazel from within the folder containing the WORKSPACE so that the WORKSPACE files is tested.
scripts.examples-program: cd examples/program && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && bazel test --test_output=errors :all
scripts.//examples-packages: Run bazel from within the folder containing the WORKSPACE so that the WORKSPACE files is tested.
scripts.examples-packages: cd examples/packages && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && bazel test --test_output=errors :all
scripts.//internal-e2e-node_loader_no_preserve_s: Run bazel from within the folder containing the WORKSPACE so that the WORKSPACE files is tested & its preserve-symlinks value is used.
scripts.internal-e2e-node_loader_no_preserve_sym: cd internal/e2e/node_loader_no_preserve_symlinks && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && bazel test ... && bazel test @node_resolve_dep//:test
scripts.//internal-e2e-node_loader_preserve_syml: Run bazel from within the folder containing the WORKSPACE so that the WORKSPACE files is tested & its preserve-symlinks value is used.
scripts.internal-e2e-node_loader_preserve_symlin: cd internal/e2e/node_loader_preserve_symlinks && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && bazel test ... && bazel test @node_resolve_dep//:test
scripts.test: yarn internal-e2e-node_loader_no_preserve_symlinks && yarn internal-e2e-node_loader_preserve_symlinks && yarn examples-packages && yarn examples-program
scripts.buildifier: find . -type f \( -name BUILD -or -name BUILD.bazel \) ! -path "*/node_modules/*" | xargs $(bazel info bazel-bin)/external/com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools/buildifier/*/buildifier
